welcome_message_body: Welcome to Matsudo, Japan! This vibrant city is known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Matsudo has to offer.

restaurants.name: Ramen Jiro (ラーメン二郎 松戸駅前店)
restaurants.description: Ramen Jiro (ラーメン二郎 松戸駅前店) is a ramen restaurant located in 松戸市.

restaurants.name: Tonikaku (兎に角)
restaurants.description: Tonikaku (兎に角) is a ramen restaurant located in 松戸市.
restaurants.address: 根本462 (比嘉ビル 1F), 松戸市, 千葉県, 271-0077

restaurants.name: Kaminari (雷 松戸駅東口店)
restaurants.description: Kaminari (雷 松戸駅東口店) is a ramen restaurant located in 松戸市.
restaurants.address: 松戸1240 (エクセル松戸 1F), 松戸市, 千葉県, 271-0092

restaurants.name: 博多長浜ラーメン フクフク
restaurants.description: 博多長浜ラーメン フクフク is a ramen restaurant located in 松戸市.

restaurants.name: Tomita (中華蕎麦 とみ田)
restaurants.description: Tomita (中華蕎麦 とみ田) is a ramen restaurant located in 松戸市.
restaurants.address: 松戸1339 (高橋ビル 1F), 松戸市, 千葉県, 271-0092

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection every 3 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Narita International Airport, serving mostly international flights

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Narita International Airport, serving mostly domestic flights

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Narita International Airport, serving mostly low-cost carriers

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 3-hour time limit per session
